mapper.sql: logid, plan_id, corp_id, corp_name, plan_type, target_id, target_name, cycle_type, cycle_value, check_type, check_obj, cur_state, state_time, create_time
mapper.select: SELECT FROM as_check_plan WHERE 1=1 AND plan_type = #{planType} AND target_id = #{targetId} AND cycle_type = #{cycleType} AND cur_state = #{curState} ORDER BY create_time DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO as_check_plan( logid, plan_id, corp_id, corp_name, plan_type, target_id, target_name, cycle_type, cycle_value, check_type, check_obj, cur_state, state_time, create_time ) VALUES( #{logid}, #{planId}, #{corpId}, #{corpName}, #{planType}, #{targetId}, #{targetName}, #{cycleType}, #{cycleValue}, #{checkType}, #{checkObj}, #{curState}, #{stateTime}, #{createTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE as_check_plan SET logid = #{logid}, plan_id = #{planId}, corp_id = #{corpId}, corp_name = #{corpName}, plan_type = #{planType}, target_id = #{targetId}, target_name = #{targetName}, cycle_type = #{cycleType}, cycle_value = #{cycleValue}, check_type = #{checkType}, check_obj = #{checkObj}, cur_state = #{curState}, state_time = #{stateTime}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE plan_id = #{planId}
